mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER (USER_ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, WORK_NO, GENDER, STATUS, NOTE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{realname}, #{workNo}, #{gender}, #{status}, #{note})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER SET USERNAME = #{username}, REALNAME = #{realname}, WORK_NO = #{workNo}, GENDER = #{gender}, STATUS = #{status}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, WORK_NO, GENDER, STATUS, NOTE, "PASSWORD" FROM T_USER
SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, WORK_NO, GENDER, STATUS, NOTE, "PASSWORD" FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT T_ROLE.ROLE_ID AS roleId, "NAME" AS name, NOTE AS note FROM T_ROLE JOIN T_USER_ROLE ON T_ROLE.ROLE_ID = T_USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.sql: USER_ID AS userId, USERNAME AS username, REALNAME AS realname, WORK_NO AS workNo, GENDER AS gender, STATUS AS status, NOTE AS note, "PASSWORD" AS "password"
